snippet.title: Ways To Play Obliteracers Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Ways to play Obliteracers, an award-winning same-screen combat racer for up to 16 players! Race brutal-cute aliens on exotic planets, using weapon powerups and physics-based vehicles to annihilate your competition in frantic round-based combat. Connect spare gamepads, laptops and smart devices as extra controllers. Coming to Steam February 2016.
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/368740
Website: http://www.obliteracers.com
Forums: http://www.reddit.com/r/obliteracers
Dev blog: http://blog.spaceduststudios.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/obliteracers
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/obliteracers
